artist: Kawase Hasui; Published by Kawaguchi Jirō; Carved by Maeda Kentarō; Printed by Komatsu Wasankichi
marks: bottom margin: 昭和五年作 {Shōwa gonen saku} (made in 1 LRC: 巴水 {Hasui}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text:
In the mountains above Nikko is the scenic Lake Chūzenji, a popular destination especially in autumn, as seen here, but also when the cherry blossoms are blooming in spring.
second edition published by Kawaguchi alone
title: Lake Chūzenji at Nikkō
